channel.title: Considered the official database for the National Flood Insurance Program on Climate Tools

item.title: FEMA's National Flood Hazard Layer (NFHL) Viewer
item.description: Developed By: FEMA Summary: The National Flood Hazard Layer (NFHL) is an interactive mapping tool that allows users to view flood hazard maps and download Flood Insurance Rate Maps (FIRMS) from the Federal Emergency Management Agency (FEMA).
